text: She's been a model for two years with work for makeup mogul Pat McGrath, Too Faced cosmetics and South Beach already under her belt. But there's one side of her that up - and - coming fashion star Gracie Phillips has always kept hidden : her family background. Now, in an exclusive interview with DailyMail. com, the 20 - year - old LA - based catwalk sensation has spoken for the first time about her actor father Lou Diamond Phillips, 56. Phillips, whose film and TV credits include La Bamba, Young Guns, Miami Vice and The 33, has three more daughters : Gracie's twin Isabella, Lilli, 18, and Indigo, 11.
